page.name: Letter of Approval - For the Teacher
page.content:
This file is for the course teacher! For this reason, this activity should remain "hidden"!

  1. Open the Word file and change highlighted sections with your information. Prepare separate letters for each student.
  2. You can then send them to each student through e-mail. Make sure that each student has already read the letter before they start doing activities in this section.
Click HERE to download the file.
